TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProviderBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了针对可扩展的提供程序模型的基实现。

span.span: Provides a base implementation for the extensible provider model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供程序模型应封装所有或多个 ASP.NET 功能，如成员身份、 文件和受保护的配置功能的一部分。The provider model is intended to encapsulate all or part of the functionality of multiple ASP.NET features, such as membership, profiles, and protected configuration. 它允许开发人员可以创建提供封装功能的多个实现的支持类。It allows the developer to create supporting classes that provide multiple implementations of the encapsulated functionality. 此外，开发人员可以编写使用提供程序模型的新功能。In addition, developers can write new features using the provider model. 这可以是功能的无需复制功能代码或重新编码应用程序层，如果需要更改的实现方法支持多个实现的功能的有效方法。This can be an effective way to support multiple implementations of a feature's functionality without duplicating the feature code or recoding the application layer if the implementation method needs to be changed. 类很简单，只包含几个基本方法和属性的所有提供程序通用的。The class is simple, containing only a few basic methods and properties that are common to all providers. 功能特定于提供程序 (如) 继承并建立必需的方法和该功能的特定于实现的提供程序必须支持的属性。Feature-specific providers (such as ) inherit from and establish the necessary methods and properties that the implementation-specific providers for that feature must support. 特定于实现的提供程序 (如) 又继承特定于功能的提供程序 (在这种情况下， )。Implementation-specific providers (such as ) inherit in turn from a feature-specific provider (in this case, ). 提供程序模型的最重要方面是 （例如，是否数据持久保存为文本文件或数据库中） 的实现抽象的应用程序代码。The most important aspect of the provider model is that the implementation (for example, whether data is persisted as a text file or in a database) is abstracted from the application code. 在配置文件中指定的给定功能的特定于实现的提供程序的类型。The type of the implementation-specific provider for the given feature is designated in a configuration file. 功能级别提供程序会将类型从配置文件中读取，并充当为功能代码的工厂。The feature-level provider then reads in the type from the configuration file and acts as a factory to the feature code. 应用程序开发人员然后可以在应用程序代码中使用的功能类。The application developer can then use the feature classes in the application code. 实现类型不能换出在配置文件中，从而无需重新编写代码以适应不同的实现方法。The implementation type can be swapped out in the configuration file, eliminating the need to rewrite the code to accommodate the different implementation methodology. 包含在 ASP.NET 提供程序是主要的配置文件或成员身份等功能的数据持久性实现的抽象概念。The providers included with ASP.NET are mostly abstractions of data persistence implementations for features like profiles or membership. 但是，此模型可以应用于任何其他类型的可能抽象和中通过多种方式实现的功能。However, this model can be applied to any other kind of feature functionality that could be abstracted and implemented in multiple ways. ## Examples 有关如何使用的示例类，请参阅[配置文件提供程序实现示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c36e8a56-b416-40b7-95c1-c662cfb8f906)。For an example of how to use the class, see [Profile Provider Implementation Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c36e8a56-b416-40b7-95c1-c662cfb8f906).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一条简短的易懂描述，它适合在管理工具或其他用户界面 (UI) 中显示。

span.span: Gets a brief, friendly description suitable for display in administrative tools or other user interfaces (UIs).

value.span: 简短的易懂描述，适合在管理工具或其他 UI 中显示。

span.span: A brief, friendly description suitable for display in administrative tools or other UIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果配置的提供程序不提供的说明的值属性将作为默认值。If a configured provider does not supply a description, the value of the property is returned as a default.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: virtual void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);
abstract member Initialize : string * System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection -> unit override this.Initialize : string * System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection -> unit

span.span: The friendly name of the provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 名称/值对的集合，表示在配置中为该提供程序指定的提供程序特定的属性。

span.span: A collection of the name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类实现在内部跟踪的次数提供程序的`Initialize`调用方法。The base class implementation internally tracks the number of times the provider's `Initialize` method has been called. 如果提供程序初始化一次以上，`InvalidOperationException`指出已初始化提供程序引发。If a provider is initialized more than once, an `InvalidOperationException` is thrown stating that the provider is already initialized. 由于大部分功能提供程序调用之前执行特定于提供程序的初始化，此方法是防止重复初始化一个中心位置。Because most feature providers call prior to performing provider-specific initialization, this method is a central location for preventing double initialization. ## Examples 有关如何使用的示例，请参阅[配置文件提供程序实现示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c36e8a56-b416-40b7-95c1-c662cfb8f906)。For an example of how to use , see [Profile Provider Implementation Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c36e8a56-b416-40b7-95c1-c662cfb8f906).

span.span: The name of the provider is .

exception.span: 提供程序名称的长度为零。

span.span: The name of the provider has a length of zero.

exception.span: 初始化提供程序后尝试在提供程序上调用 。

span.span: An attempt is made to call on a provider after the provider has already been initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获得一个友好名称，用于在配置过程中引用提供程序。

span.span: Gets the friendly name used to refer to the provider during configuration.

value.span: 用于在配置过程中引用提供程序的友好名称。

span.span: The friendly name used to refer to the provider during configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的建议的模式是: [*提供程序创建者*] [*实现类型*] [*功能*] 提供程序。The recommended pattern for this string is: [*Provider Creator*][*Implementation Type*][*Feature*]Provider. 尽管属性还提供了友好描述属性用作提供程序的标识符。Although the property also provides a friendly description, the property is used as an identifier for the provider.
